# Job Title
Human Resources Management Business Owner Support Services
# Tender Reference
[No: PW-23-01022131](http://canadabuys.canada.ca/standard/solicitations/PW-23-01022131)
# Tender Solicitation Number
[24062-23-361](http://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/19/49c8dc832ea0f9641f9943d86102fe38/23-361_task-based_npp.pdf)

# Tender Description
This solicitation seeks to engage a contractor to provide Human Resources Management Business Owner Support Services to the Treasury Board of Canada. The services will be tailored to meet the needs of the Transformation Design, Development, and Operationalization Program, as outlined in Annex A of the contract.

## Request for Proposal (RFP)
A Request for Proposal (RFP) was issued on 19 January, 2023. The bid closing deadline was first extended to February 22nd 2023 and later to March 1st 2023. This announcement should be read in conjunction with the information provided in the bid solicitation package.

## Contract Duration
The contract duration will be one year, with two irrevocable option years which will extend the term of the contract.

## Limitation of Expenditure
The value of the resulting contract is estimated to be up to $3,318,584.00, excluding applicable taxes.

## Security and Authentication
Applicable security requirements, including Common Professions Services SRCL #19, will be applied to the procurement.

## Contact Information
For further assistance, please contact:
* Name:  Gonga, Brigitte
* Email:  Brigitte.Gonga@tbs-sct.gc.ca
* Phone Number:  (613) 218-6635
